question: Which Indian bank has collaborated with IIT Kanpur to set up a Fintech Innovation Centre (FIC)?
explanation:
The countryâ€™s second largest public sector bank, Punjab National Bank has partnered with IIT Kanpur and FIRST (Foundation for Innovation & Research in Science & Technology), to establish Fintech Innovation Centre (FIC).
The Innovation centre will be set up at the IIT campus, which will facilitate research and development in technological solutions used in the Banking and Finance Sector.
